sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Nike has lost about 7.0% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading down 1.1%.
Verizon Communications is showing a gain of 13.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are International Business Machines ( IBM ), trading down 0.9%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
